entries.s_fafa8703: Yeah, but that doesn't surprise me.
entries.s_e9a5dbe: I'm digging up his past before they start digging his grave.
entries.s_d920c8d:
You have quite the morbid sense of humor don't yah?

Well, what do you need to know about Ol' Grizzy Two Tune?
entries.s_d80ca537:
I've heard one or two of them moved to Lok about twenty some years ago, though it's been quite a while since I've heard from any them. I fear age may have caught up with them sooner than our friend Grizzlo.

I know a musician at the cantina on Lok near Nym's stronghold. He would know if any of those guys are still around. Look for Vixur Webb there.
entries.s_cf3cdb9a: Why did they break up if they were so popular?
entries.s_cefcce06: Yes? Are you talking to me?
entries.s_c8ad3417: Who'da guessed that.  Well, what do you need to know about Ol' Grizzy Two Tune?
entries.s_c7d951f7: I think I've exceed my interest in this whole thing. Forget about it.
entries.s_c7b21593:
I've heard one or two of them moved to Lok about twenty some years ago, though it's been quite a while since I've heard from any them. I fear age may have caught up with them sooner than our friend Grizzlo.

I know a musician at the cantina on Lok near Nym's stronghold. He would know if any of those guys are still around. Look for Vixur Webb there.
entries.s_bdb08f0b:
That's what they used to call him; his band didn't know more than two tunes.

Truth is the tunes they did play were something else; I don't think their popularity ever spread off world though. 

Need to know anything else?
entries.s_b38f136f: The band had some sort of falling out, I'm sure it was over a girl.  Tad bit cliche, eh?
entries.s_91a67d52: Do you know where I can find any of his band mates?
entries.s_8db3d0fb: Do you know where I can find the other band members?
entries.s_8593cffc: Old Grizzy?  Sure, I've heard of him.  Didn't he die a few years back?
entries.s_83a3fa55: Do you know an old man by the name of Grizzlo?
entries.s_79a946b4: Know the current location of any of his band mates?
entries.s_71918486: No, he is very much alive. Well, sort of.
entries.s_60181c57: Never mind, I've decided I don't care.
entries.s_5d25f30f: Beep boop bop bop... yeah, play that thing.
entries.s_58a6b3: These stories never change friend.  Is that all you needed to know?
entries.s_51ea4418: Never mind, I don't think I care any more.
entries.s_46660c8b: Whatever you say. You were the one asking questions.
entries.s_284c1131: Whatever you say. Not like it makes any difference to me.
entries.s_26888d70: It's forgotten. Like you've never been here. Really, who are you?
entries.s_1e50f991: Sadly, I've lost interest in this..
